com.kdbp.calendar.data
Class DataHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.kdbp.calendar.data.DataHandler
public class DataHandler
extends Object

This handles all data that is read and written from disk. It fulfills requests from the CalFrame.

Constructor Summary

          Default constructor Creates a new DataHandler with the default filename and auto-save setting

          Creates a new data handler with the specified filename.

          Creates a new data handler with the specified filename and auto-save setting

Method Detail

getApptRange

public List getApptRange(GregorianCalendar firstDay,
                         GregorianCalendar lastDay)
                  throws DateOutOfRangeException
Retrieves a range of appointments between two dates.
Returns:
A list of all of the CalDays between firstDate (inclusive) and lastDate (exclusive) with their respective appointments. If the data handler has not been initialized correctly, null is returned.
Throws:
DateOutOfRangeException - If any of the days constructed by the given values are invalid, or if date 2 is not after date 1.

saveAppt

public boolean saveAppt(Appt appt)
Saves an appointment's information to the XML data tree. Does not write a new XML file to disk.
Returns:
True if the appointment was saved correctly

deleteAppt

public boolean deleteAppt(Appt appt)
Deletes the appointment's information from the XML data tree. Does not write a new XML file to disk.
Returns:
True if the appointment is deleted successfully.

save

public boolean save()
Writes a new XML file to disk.
